channel.title: anon on WATERCOLOR.WHISTLER.PAGE
channel.description: Recent content in anon on WATERCOLOR.WHISTLER.PAGE

item.title: Debug Mode
item.description: Hey look, it’s my first commission! This one’s rather simple, but it let me try out some new formatting styles. I really like how it ended up, even if it’s not truly 1:1 with the original game. What I’m more proud of is the dialogue, especially considering how much of a stickler I am when it comes to being accurate to the source material. Commissioner is anonymous, the anon is over 18.
